feed.title: Otter Wiki Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.10.4
entry.content:
Compare with v2.10.3

Bug Fixes

  • Anther c hotkey related fix: disable hotkey on mobile browsers while editing PR#227

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.10.5
entry.content:
Compare with v2.10.4

Chores

Usually chores are not part of the changelog, here an exception is made:

  • with PR#233 by @defron a pile pf type hints have been introduced into An Otter Wiki which increases the code quality and should help with further development.

Features

  • yaml frontmatter renderer plugin added see PR#207 by @ReessKennedy.
  • check if registered name is looks sane, to prevent spam. See #235 (778fc4f).

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed line spacing in the editor. Set pre margin-bottom only when viewing (8a3a6ed).
  • /<Pagename>/blame links to the "view" endpoint which uses ?revision=, see #230 (40ee3bf).
  • correct date headers for attachments, see #231 and #232 (5dbccf).
  • docker: bumped up the uwsgi buffer size, see #184 (ae4d3aa).
  • Disable hotkeys [ and / when modifiers are enabled by @dafalcon, see #236 (1359032).

Dependencies

  • updated mermaid to 11.6.0 (f3b38be).

New Contributors

  • @defron made their first contribution in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/232

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.10.6
entry.content:
Compare with v2.10.5

Deployment Features

  • added curl to the Docker images for health checks, see #242 (f311403).

Bug Fixes

  • titleSs() handles now ÃŸ at the end of the page correct, see #243 (d71e8f1).
  • commits and diffs of filenames with quotes can be rendered, see #244 (fedfd48).

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.11.0
entry.content:
Compare with v2.10.6

Features

  • added SIDEBAR_MENUTREE_FOCUS setting that allows to always display all pages in the sidebar, see #169 (495cca1).
  • added rss/atom feeds of the changelog, see #255 (8f53031).
  • enable fragments in wikilinks, e.g. [[wikilinks#fragment]], see #246 (f60f6e9).

Deloyment Features

  • docker image: www-data uid/gid is set to PUID/PGID, see #252 (a46520a).
  • docker "-slim" image can handle --user to change the uid/gid, see #252 (f32fd07).

Bug Fixes

  • Unicode characters breaking page history, see #253 (3640ccf).

Code Refactoring and Chores

  • followed pyright suggestions, cleaned up (e24f648).
  • Spelling corrections by @blukid in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/248
  • chore(deps): bump flask from 3.1.0 to 3.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/249

New Contributors

  • @blukid made their first contribution in https://github.com/redimp/otterwiki/pull/248

entry.title: New release for Otter Wiki: v2.11.1
entry.content:
Compare with v2.11.0

Bug Fixes

  • markdown files are no longer listed as attachments, see #254. (514417a).
  • Dockerfile use ENV not ARG for PUID and PGID (438b4ac).
  • workaround for unraid templates with PGID=100, see #257 (d27f993).
